attributes.title: Average Requests per Session
attributes.visState: {"title":"Average Requests per Session","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es('log_id:WR-SG-SUMMARY', index='airlock-waf-default-*', metric='count').divide(.max(.es('log_id:WR-SG-SUMMARY', index='airlock-waf-default-*', metric='cardinality:sess_id'), 1)).label('average requests per sessions')","interval":"auto","type":"timelion"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}
